tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quiz_scores (
  quiz_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  learner_id INT,
  quiz_score INT,
  feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    quiz_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE
);}

CREATE TABLE quiz_responses (
    response_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    attempt_id UUID,
    question_id UUID,
    answer_text TEXT,
    is_correct BOOLEAN
);
